channel.title: Glory help!
channel.description:
ok. i don't know how to add teleports for the glory. when it's in your inv you can right click and rub it but nothing happens. how do i add the options for it and were it tele's you to. also when u right click it on your neck there isn't a "operate" how would i add this.
----------server----------- rsps 317
delta base.

item.title: Glory help!
item.dc:creator: @man4120 man4120
item.description:
@man4120 wrote:

wrong section but my pi source has this in playerassistant

public void handleGlory(int gloryId) {
	c.getDH().sendOption4("Edgeville", "Al Kharid", "Karamja", "Mage Bank");
	c.usingGlory = true;

Read full topic
